title: 14 day ban over, but still says I can't play cause banned.
body:
So I got a 14 day ban, and it's been like a month, I get no "you've been perma banned" message but when i try to play it says i'm banned, it was only supposed to be 14 days >_> 
IGN: Lcs victoria

replies.body:
Since this issue is regarding a suspension, you'll need to reach out to our specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll be able to give you more details and context on what happened that way.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I was banned 2 weeks ago and my suspension is over, but it wont let be play. What do i do?
